Parameters: MediaDrm: the MediaDrm object on which the event occurred This value must never be null.
byte: the DRM session ID on which the event occurred, or null if there is no session ID associated with the event. This value may be null.

int: indicates the event type Value is @B_android#media#MediaDrm#EVENT_PROVISION_REQUIRED_E@, @B_android#media#MediaDrm#EVENT_KEY_REQUIRED_E@, @B_android#media#MediaDrm#EVENT_KEY_EXPIRED_E@, @B_android#media#MediaDrm#EVENT_VENDOR_DEFINED_E@, or @B_android#media#MediaDrm#EVENT_SESSION_RECLAIMED_E@
byte: optional byte array of data that may be associated with the event This value may be null.
onEvent(android.media.MediaDrm,byte[],in.Description: Called when an event occurs that requires the app to be notified
onEvent(android.media.MediaDrm,byte[],in.FullName: public abstract void onEvent (MediaDrm md, byte[] sessionId, int event, int extra, byte[] data)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a drm event occurs
